paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: The paper discusses the prevalence and clinical characteristics of transthyretin cardiac amyloidosis (ATTR-CA) among patients with unexplained heart failure and systolic LV dysfunction. No specific genetic variants in the TTR gene were reported.

challenges: The paper did not report any specific genetic variants in the TTR gene.
extraction_metadata.notes: The paper focused on clinical and diagnostic aspects of ATTR-CA without detailing specific genetic variants in the TTR gene.
